sn23.7:1.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam radham bhagava etadavoca:
sn23.7:1.6: Yato kho, radha, ariyasavako imesam pancannam upadanakkhandhanam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati—
sn23.7:1.7: ayam vuccati, radha, ariyasavako sotapanno avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
